verses.text: The words of Jeremiah the son of Hilkiah , of the priests that \add were\add* in Anathoth in the land of Benjamin :
To whom the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came in the days of Josiah the son of Amon king of Judah , in the thirteenth year of his reign.

It came also in the days of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah , unto the end of the eleventh year of Zedekiah the son of Josiah king of Judah , unto the carrying away of Jerusalem captive in the fifth month. \p
Then the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,

Before I formed thee in the belly I knew thee; and before thou camest forth out of the womb I sanctified thee, \add and\add* I ordained thee a prophet unto the nations.\f + \fr 1.5 \ft ordained: Heb. gave\f*
Then said I, Ah , Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*! behold, I cannot speak : for I \add am\add* a child. \p
¶ But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said unto me, Say not, I \add am\add* a child : for thou shalt go to all that I shall send thee, and whatsoever I command thee thou shalt speak.
Be not afraid of their faces : for I \add am\add* with thee to deliver thee, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Then the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* put forth his hand , and touched my mouth. And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* said unto me, Behold, I have put my words in thy mouth.
See , I have this day set thee over the nations and over the kingdoms , to root out , and to pull down , and to destroy , and to throw down , to build , and to plant. \p
¶ Moreover the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying , Jeremiah , what seest thou? And I said , I see a rod of an almond tree.
Then said the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto me, Thou hast well seen : for I will hasten my word to perform it.

And the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me the second time , saying , What seest thou? And I said , I see a seething pot ; and the face thereof \add is\add* toward the north.\f + \fr 1.13 \ft toward…: Heb. from the face of the north\f*
Then the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said unto me, Out of the north an evil shall break forth upon all the inhabitants of the land.\f + \fr 1.14 \ft shall…: Heb. shall be opened\f*

For, lo, I will call all the families of the kingdoms of the north , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and they shall come , and they shall set every one his throne at the entering of the gates of Jerusalem , and against all the walls thereof round about , and against all the cities of Judah.
And I will utter my judgments against them touching all their wickedness , who have forsaken me, and have burned incense unto other gods , and worshipped the works of their own hands. \p

¶ Thou therefore gird up thy loins , and arise , and speak unto them all that I command thee: be not dismayed at their faces , lest I confound thee before them.\f + \fr 1.17 \ft confound: or, break to pieces\f*

For, behold, I have made thee this day a defenced city , and an iron pillar , and brasen walls against the whole land , against the kings of Judah , against the princes thereof, against the priests thereof, and against the people of the land.
And they shall fight against thee; but they shall not prevail against thee; for I \add am\add* with thee, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to deliver thee.
